mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.cmd AS "cmd", a.format AS "format", a.type AS "type", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_template( id, name, cmd, format, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( default, #{name}, #{cmd}, #{format}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_template SET name = #{name}, cmd = #{cmd}, format = #{format}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.sql: JOIN t_project_template g ON g.templateid = a.id
